properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_ACCOMPANY ( ACCOM_NO , USER_NO , USER_NO2 , PLAN_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_ACCOMPANY WHERE ACCOM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT C.ACCOM_NO , M.USER_ID , M.USER_NICK , C.USER_NO , C.USER_NO2 FROM TB_ACCOMPANY C JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO2 = M.USER_NO) WHERE C.ACCOM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.ACCOM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_ACCOMPANY SET ACCOM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE ACCOM_NO = ?
